metadata.title: CVE-2024-35925 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: block:prevent division by zero in blk_rq_stat_sum() The expressiondst->nr_samples + src->nr_samples may have zero value on overflow. It isnecessary to add a check to avoid division by zero. Found by LinuxVerification Center (linuxtesting.org) with Svace.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
